693: A. Your rights and duties under this policy may not be assigned without our written consent. However, if a named insured shown in the Declarations dies, coverage will be provided for: 1. The surviving spouse if resident in the same household at the time of death. Coverage ap- plies to the spouse as if a named insured shown in the Declarations; and 2. The legal representative of the deceased person as if a named insured shown in the Declarations. This applies only with respect to the representative's legal responsibility to maintain or use "your covered auto ".
694: B. Coverage will only be provided until the next anniversary of the policy's original effective date.
